flawed_nl_solution:
Roberto skips 70 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70>>70.
Together they skip 105 times a minute.
They will skip 1575 times because 105 x 15 = <<105*15=1575>>1575

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150.0, not 105.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
